SEARCH
Package librarySE.managers

Class BorrowManager

java.lang.Object
librarySE.managers.BorrowManager
public class BorrowManager extends Object
Central manager responsible for handling all borrowing and returning operations in the library system.

It manages:

  • Borrowing and returning of library items
  • Automatic fine calculation for overdue items
  • Waitlist management for unavailable items
  • Email notifications to users when a waited item becomes available

Implements the Singleton Pattern to ensure only one global instance manages borrow operations.

Note: Email notifications require a configured EmailService with valid credentials in the .env file.

Author:
Malak

  • Method Details

    • init

      public static BorrowManager init(BorrowRecordRepository borrowRepo, WaitlistRepository waitlistRepo, ItemManager itemManager)
      Initializes the singleton instance.
      Parameters:
      borrowRepo - repository for borrow records
      waitlistRepo - repository for waitlist entries
      itemManager - manager for items (for persisting copy counts)
      Returns:
      the initialized BorrowManager instance

    • getInstance

      public static BorrowManager getInstance()
      Gets the active BorrowManager instance.
      Returns:
      the BorrowManager instance
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if not initialized yet

    • borrowItem

      public boolean borrowItem(User user, LibraryItem item)
      Attempts to borrow an item for a user.

      If the item is unavailable, the user is automatically added to the waitlist.

      Parameters:
      user - the user borrowing the item
      item - the item to borrow
      Returns:
      true if borrowed successfully; false if added to waitlist
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if user or item is null
      IllegalStateException - if user has unpaid fines or overdue items

    • returnItem

      public void returnItem(User user, LibraryItem item)
      Marks an item as returned and notifies users waiting for it via email.
      Parameters:
      user - the user returning the item
      item - the item being returned
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if user or item is null

    • applyOverdueFines

      public void applyOverdueFines(LocalDate date)
      Applies overdue fines to all records that are past their due date.
      Parameters:
      date - the date to check against

    • payFineForUser

      public void payFineForUser(User user, BigDecimal amount, LocalDate date)
      Handles paying fines for a given user.

      This method:

      • Ensures fines are up-to-date as of date
      • Distributes the payment across that user's borrow records (finePaid)
      • Subtracts the paid amount from the user's fine balance
      Parameters:
      user - the user who is paying
      amount - the amount they are paying
      date - the date of payment (used to recalculate fines)

    • getBorrowRecordsForUser

      public List<BorrowRecord> getBorrowRecordsForUser(User user)
      Retrieves all borrow records for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose records to retrieve
      Returns:
      list of borrow records for that user

    • calculateTotalFines

      public BigDecimal calculateTotalFines(User user, LocalDate date)
      Calculates the total fines owed by a user at a given date.
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose fines to calculate
      date - the date for evaluation
      Returns:
      total fine amount
